subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Vegas Grand Prix will not return in 2008 for the Champ Car World Series. Race officials said they were unable to find a new promoter to replace DDB Ventures, which ran the inaugural race in April. DDB Ventures also canceled a race in Phoenix in December, then closed its race promotions business.
